roleset.name: lacking

role.descr: amount of arg1 lacked, if stated separately

example.name: deficit-n
example.text: Adequate calcium is so critical that your body has evolved mechanisms to saturate your blood with calcium if there is even a perception of calcium deficit.

example.name: deficit-n
example.text: One approach has racked up a nearly $1 trillion deficit in the past six months alone
example.arg: in the past six months alone

example.name: deficit-n
example.text: At last the climax came, an audit was demanded, and the result was a profit deficit of £10 3s.

example.name: deficient-j
example.text: In many districts it was deficient by 40 per cent.

roleset.note: DEFICIT-N, DEFICIENT NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.
Note that when the deficit is given as a dollar amount, the thing lacked are dollars, so it is appropriate to use arg2. Reserve arg3 for cases like the next example.
